title: buscopan
author: buscopan
content: Hello Everyone,I am Shelly, 39years old female and looking for a job. I am a credible and knowledgeable online content writer and virtual assistant for your everyday support. If you have need for someone who can step on board to make your work easier as well as provide exceptional customer support service then I am just that person you need. I have been in the online HYIP/REVSHARE/CRYPTO world for about 8years. I have experience working to create project and support admin.I am able to work 7days a week and available for up to 10hours daily including weekends.Some of the services I offer include:1) Set up and manage Social Media Accounts (Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Telegram, Youtube)2) Email Management3) Online Chat Support and answer support tickets4) Create screen cast / tutorial video 5) Create website content6) Update front end websites7) Research and put in the work to make a project successfulI am very dedicated to whatever I do and always open to learn and grow.TG: @winners_wÂ https://t.me/winners_wThanks.
